import React,{useContext}from'react';import'./Tag.css';import{ConsoleContext}from"../ConsoleContext";import{useFetch}from'../../utils/Hook';import Card from"../../componenets/Card";import NoData from"../../componenets/NoData";import Loader from"../../componenets/Loader";import authHeader from"../../utils/auth-header";import{CONSTANTS}from'../../utils/constants';var Tag=function Tag(){var _useContext=useContext(ConsoleContext),marketContext=_useContext.marketContext,productContext=_useContext.productContext,languageContext=_useContext.languageContext;var _useFetch=useFetch({url:"".concat(CONSTANTS.URL_PREFIX,"://prody.me/api/product_page_tag/").concat(marketContext,"/").concat(productContext),header:authHeader(),method:'GET',dep1:productContext}),data=_useFetch.data,loading=_useFetch.loading;// console.log(`marketContext ${marketContext}, productContext ${productContext}`);
var content=function content(){if(loading){return React.createElement(Loader,null);}else if(!data.length){return React.createElement(NoData,null);}else if(languageContext==='ENG'){var tags=[data[0].tag1_eng,data[0].tag2_eng,data[0].tag3_eng,data[0].tag4_eng].filter(function(tag){return tag!=null;});return tags.map(function(tag,index){return React.createElement("div",{className:"tag",key:index},tag);});}else if(languageContext==='HEB'){var _tags=[data[0].tag1_heb,data[0].tag2_heb,data[0].tag3_heb,data[0].tag4_heb].filter(function(tag){return tag!=null;});return _tags.map(function(tag,index){return React.createElement("div",{className:"tag",key:index},tag);});}};var allContent=function allContent(){if(languageContext==='ENG'){return React.createElement("div",{className:"tagContainerEng"},React.createElement("div",{style:{'fontWeight':'bold','marginRight':'4px','marginBottom':'5px'}},"Tags"),React.createElement("div",{className:"tagContent"},content()));}else if(languageContext==='HEB'){return React.createElement("div",{className:"tagContainerHeb"},React.createElement("div",{style:{'fontWeight':'bold','marginLeft':'4px'}},"\u05EA\u05D2\u05D9\u05D5\u05EA"),React.createElement("div",{className:"tagContent"},content()));}};return React.createElement(Card,null,allContent());};export default Tag;
